title: Proxied responses should propagate all headers rather than the first one for each key.
description: Brought up by Patrick Hunt while we worked on SOLR-5442

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: I've included this fix as part of my patch for SOLR-5442.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1542333 from Mark Miller in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1542333 ]

SOLR-5442: Python client cannot parse proxied response when served by Tomcat.
SOLR-5445: Proxied responses should propagate all headers rather than the first one for each key.
